## Carregando pacotes e datasets

```{r}
pacman::p_load(pacman, tidyverse)
library(datasets)
?iris
head(iris)
```

### Traduzindo Species

```{r}
iris %>%
  mutate(Species.trad = recode(Species, 
      "setosa" = 1,
      "virginica" = 2,
      .default = 3)) %>%
  select(Species, Species.trad)
```

## Limpeza

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
detach("package:datasets", unload = TRUE)
dev.off()
cat("\014")
```
